resources.string: AudioMail helps you send mails completely via audio. To begin, click on the button at the bottom center, and say:
Two, to enter the Mail subject
Three, to enter the Message Body.
Four, to see the mail summary and send the mail.
Clicking on the button at the bottom left, you can read out the recipient\'s address, clicking on the button on the bottom right, you can say the commands. Say:
One, to read out what you\'ve wrote.
Two, to clear what you\'ve wrote.
Three, to go to the next section.
Clicking on the button at the bottom left, you can read out the mail subject, clicking on the button on the bottom right, you can say the commands. Say:
One, to read out what you\'ve wrote.
Two, to clear what you\'ve wrote.
Three, to go to the next section.
Clicking on the button at the bottom left, you can read out the message body, clicking on the button on the bottom right, you can say the commands. Say:
One, to read out what you\'ve wrote.
Two, to clear what you\'ve wrote.
Three, to go to the next section.
Clicking on the button at the bottom center, Say:
One, to read out the summary of your mail.
Two, to clear all mail information.
Five, to go back to home page.

Welcome to the home page. AudioMail helps you send mails completely via audio. To begin, click on the button at the bottom center, and say: One, to enter Recipients Address. Two, to enter the Carbon Copy\'s Address. Three, to enter the Message Body. Four, to see the mail summary and send the mail. Five, to repeat the instructions.

Mail Recipient page. Clicking on the button at the bottom left, you can read out the recipient\'s address, using the button on the bottom right, you can say the commands. Say: One, to read out what you\'ve wrote. Two, to clear what you\'ve wrote. Three, to go back to main page. Four, to repeat the instructions.

Mail Subject page. Clicking on the button at the bottom left, you can read out the mail subject, using the button on the bottom right, you can say the commands. Say: One, to read out what you\'ve wrote. Two, to clear what you\'ve wrote. Three, to go back to main page. Four, to repeat the instructions.

Mail Body page. Clicking on the button at the bottom left, you can read out the message body, using the button on the bottom right, you can say the commands. Say: One, to read out what you\'ve wrote. Two, to clear what you\'ve wrote. Three, to go back to main page. Four, to repeat the instructions.

Mail Summary-Send page. Clicking on the button at the bottom center, Say: One, to read out the summary of your mail. Two, to clear all mail information. Three, to send mail. Four, to repeat the instructions. Five, to go back to home page.
